questions.question: The existence of electromagnetic waves was first experimentally demonstrated by

explanations.a: Incorrect: Maxwell predicted electromagnetic waves theoretically.
explanations.b: Incorrect: Faraday contributed to the theory but did not demonstrate EM waves.
explanations.c: Correct: Heinrich Hertz experimentally demonstrated EM waves in 1887.
explanations.d: Incorrect: Tesla worked on electromagnetism but not EM wave demonstration.

questions.question: Visible region in hydrogen spectrum is

explanations.a: Incorrect: Lyman series is in ultraviolet region.
explanations.b: Correct: Balmer series lies in the visible spectrum.
explanations.c: Incorrect: Paschen series lies in the infrared region.
explanations.d: Incorrect: Brackett series is also in infrared region.
